title: Realme X7 Pro and Realme 8 Pro owners can now try out Realme UI 3.0 based on Android 12
content:
After rolling out beta builds of Realme UI 3.0 to the Realme GT series last week, Realme has opened up the Android 12 beta program for two new smartphones: the Realme X7 Pro and Realme 8 Pro. The beta program allows users to try out an early version of Android 12 ahead of the final

The post Realme X7 Pro and Realme 8 Pro owners can now try out Realme UI 3.0 based on Android 12 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Realme is inviting owners of the Realme X7 Pro and Realme 8 Pro to try out a beta version of Realme UI 3.0 based on Android 12.
